sensor.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ADC sensor to measure the sensor’s output voltage pulses from.

*See also: [Sharp GP2Y1010AU0F PM2.5 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/gp2y1010au0f.html#configuration-variables)*

adc_voltage_offset.docs:
**float**: The voltage offset of the ADC sensor used for calibration. Defaults to `0`.

*See also: [Sharp GP2Y1010AU0F PM2.5 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/gp2y1010au0f.html#configuration-variables)*

adc_voltage_multiplier.docs:
**float**: The voltage multiplier of the ADC sensor used for calibration. Defaults to `1.0`.

*See also: [Sharp GP2Y1010AU0F PM2.5 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/gp2y1010au0f.html#configuration-variables)*

output.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The binary [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to control the sensor’s internal IR LED.

*See also: [Sharp GP2Y1010AU0F PM2.5 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/gp2y1010au0f.html#configuration-variables)*
